DOC.brief_summary: The investigator develop interactive , multimedia computer-based depression treatment program ( Dartmouth Research Problem Solving Therapy ; DrPST ) . DrPST base evidence-based psychotherapy call Problem Solving Therapy depress patient identify problem live work structured format solve problem . The investigator subject DrPST Phase 1-3 feasibility , acceptability efficacy trial positive without adverse event . The purpose current study make DrPST available Employee Assistance Program ( EAP ) Dartmouth-Hitchcock Medical Center Faculty Employee Assistance Program ( FEAP ) Dartmouth College order ass feasibility , acceptability effectiveness naturalistic condition .
DOC.brief_title: Computer-based Dartmouth Research Problem Solving Therapy ( DrPST ) Depression Employee Assistance Programs ( EAP )
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To assess feasibility , acceptability effectiveness DrPST naturalistic condition . Hypotheses : H1 : Greater 50 % participant refer DrPST complete least 4 treatment session . H2 : Participants report DrPST acceptable stand-alone treatment depression . H3 : On average , participant 's self-reported depression severity score PHQ-9 decrease time . Procedures : Consecutive employee faculty member receive evaluation EAP program Dartmouth-Hitchcock Medical Center ( DHMC ) Dartmouth College identify depressed potentially able benefit use DrPST refer program . DrPST load onto laptops Health Information Library DHMC FEAP clinic Dartmouth College . Materials : Laptop computer contain DrPST program . Data Collection : All study data automatically collect DrPST program . Evaluation data ( i.e. , Patient Health Questionnaire 9-item Depression Scale ; PHQ-9 ) score acceptability program ) collect session . Information enter program part use DrPST ( e.g. , type problem work , success solve problem , satisfaction effort , compliance homework , obstacle encounter ) also automatically store . Users assign anonymous ID code enable use program . . Evaluation measure work perform use DrPST store laptop later retrieval investigator . The laptop secure site . Only age gender collect . No identify information ( e.g. , name , address , dob , SS # ) collect . All enter data store accord assign ID .
DOC.criteria: Adult employee ( age 18 old ) faculty attend EAP program DHMC Dartmouth College complain depression .
